title: Ticket #2323: Clear nmi externals cache daily
description: On several occasions, code changes related to the externals that broke the build went unnoticed for a week or more due to caching of the externals on the nmi machines. In order to reduce the chance of this happening, we want to clear the externals cache on nmi machines once a day. Rebuilding the externals once a day shouldn't be a significant increase in usage of the machines.
remarks:
2011-Aug-02 14:33:29 by jfrey:
--clear-externals-cache-daily is now an option to condor_nmi_submit on master. It's invoked for the nightly and continuous builds.
check_ins: 2011-Jul-19 17:11   Check-in [22549]: Allow daily clearing of externals cache in nmi. #2323 Added new option --clear-externals-cache-daily to condor_nmi_submit. If given, the externals cache will be cleared if it dates back to a previous day. --nightly implies --clear-externals-cache-daily. (By Jaime Frey )
